title: Sign Language Detection
description: Utilized TensorFlow and Keras to construct a deep neural network with LSTM layers, allowing the model to effectively decode sign language from sequences of key points extracted using MediaPipe.

title: Handwritten Digit and Character Classification
description: Implemented a handwritten digit recognition application using the MNIST dataset, leveraging CNNs to achieve high accuracy in classifying digits. Developed a GUI for real-time recognition capabilities.

title: NBA MVP Predictor
description: Predicted the NBA's Most Valuable Player using machine learning algorithms, including Linear Regression, Ridge Regression, Random Forest, and Boosted Trees.

title: Time Series Analysis on LA Weather Forecast
description: Analyzed monthly weather patterns in Downtown Los Angeles using SARIMA and Lagged Regression to explore global warming, seasonal variations, and significant weather trends.

title: ECG Irregular Heartbeat Diagnosis
description: Used ECG data from Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory for binary classification of healthy vs irregular heartbeats, achieving 99% accuracy. Also performed multiclass classification for various heartbeat types using multiple models.

title: YouTube Data Analysis
description: Conducted data analysis on YouTube trends to understand content patterns, viewer engagement, and influential factors across various categories.

title: World Happiness Report 2023
description: Explored the World Happiness Report 2023 to analyze factors affecting life satisfaction in North America, identifying meaningful patterns across diverse countries.

title: Tableau: Video Games Sales Dashboard
description: Created an interactive dashboard in Tableau to explore video game sales by region, year, publisher, and title, offering insights through dynamic filters.

title: Fertility Rate and Population Growth by Continent
description: Analyzed UNdata on population growth and fertility rates across continents, observing a decline over time and exploring socioeconomic factors influencing these trends.

title: Credit Card Classifier
description: Developed a classifier to detect fraudulent credit card transactions, applying techniques like Decision Trees, Random Forest, and Logistic Regression to improve accuracy.

title: Tableau: Asians in Fortune 1000 Companies
description: Built a dashboard to visualize the representation of Asian executives in Fortune 1000 companies, aiming to understand racial diversity in leadership roles.

title: Star and Galaxy Classification
description: Classified stars and galaxies using a 34,000-image dataset from HSC, employing image preprocessing and deep learning techniques to enhance accuracy.
